attributes.action: Make Sports Interactive release Football Manager 2008 with the old Skin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every Football Season Sports Interactive release a game called Football Manager i have been quite rightly addicted to Football Manager that is until i downloaded the new demo for Football Manager 2008, I was then disgusted at the state of the state of the skin. IF IT AIN'T BROKE DONT FIF IT. I have refused to buy the new game even though i have every one from the past 10 years.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
